body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Lewis County, Kentucky, native. Son of Henry Bloomfield and Catharine Bloomfield. Married to Nancy J. Miller Bloomfield in Carter County, Kentucky, on January 2, 1854. Father of William A. Bloomfield, William Washington Bloomfield, and Henry P. Bloomfield. Married to Jane Morgan Bloomfield in Lewis County on October 23, 1859. Father of Sarah Bloomfield, Nancy Jane Bloomfield, and Elora Bloomfield. Resident of Lewis County in 1850. Farmer in Lewis County in 1860.
